name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)

name: following
description: Description: Are you following this user?

name: showing_reblogs
description: Description: Are you receiving this user’s boosts in your home timeline?

name: notifying
description: Description: Have you enabled notifications for this user?

name: languages
type: Type: Array of String (ISO 639-1 language two-letter code)
description: Description: Which languages are you following from this user?

name: followed_by
description: Description: Are you followed by this user?

name: blocking
description: Description: Are you blocking this user?

name: blocked_by
description: Description: Is this user blocking you?

name: muting
description: Description: Are you muting this user?

name: muting_notifications
description: Description: Are you muting notifications from this user?

name: requested
description: Description: Do you have a pending follow request for this user?

name: domain_blocking
description: Description: Are you blocking this user’s domain?

name: endorsed
description: Description: Are you featuring this user on your profile?
